stories.name: Organize and execute 6 guided tours
stories.details: We have to make those tours more appealing
stories.results: We have only organized 5 guided tours because there had been an unexpected disaster. More info here

stories.name: Increase by 60% the returning user
stories.details: Ask Uncle Sam for some useful tips
stories.results: We have increased our returning user more than expected thanks to Uncle Sam's tips. We have increased it by 63%. You can see data here
